title: enda nEramum
sahitya:
enda nEramum unran tiruvaDi tannai ninaindiDa varamaruLAyO


anupallavi

  santatam munivOr cintaiyil uraiyum shentAmaraik-kaNNA maNIvaNNA


caraNam    pongum pudu vAzhvu pUttup-polindAlum nIngAc-celvam niraindirundAlum
 tangum kruNaiyE dAsharathI enrum mangAda un pugazhai ninaindu
